subject: Belmont Stakes
Horse Racing
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
lead_paragraph: Any worries his trainer, Graham Motion, had about Animal Kingdom handling the surface known as Big Sandy were erased as the colt turned in the fastest of 32 horses’ timed workouts.
snippet: Any worries his trainer, Graham Motion, had about Animal Kingdom handling the surface known as Big Sandy were erased as the colt turned in the fastest of 32 horses’ timed workouts.
